playNote(int, int) - Method in class Business.PlayModel
Play note will be the method in charge of interpreting the specific note at a given velocity to generate the sound of the note we desire..

The method playPause will simply stop or start the sequencer from the class PlayModel when needed.

Method in charge of playing or pausing the song selected
playSound(int) - Method in class Business.PlayModel
The method Play sound will get the value from the key depending on the octave we are at and play the given note by means of another method called PlayNote.
